answers.answer: And his thyroid? Has it been checked as well?

Has anyone checked to see what his Thyroid function is like? One of the problems with your post is that you are not asking a direct question; if you did, that might help. The thyroid would be the first thing I would be asking about. Diabetes can also make people cold, as can something called Raynuards.
